content: उपसंख्यानं {@--1@} Addition. {@--2@} Supplementary addition, further or additional enumeration (a term technically applied to the {%Vārtikas%} of <ls>Kātyāyana</ls> which are intended to supply omissions in Pāṇini's Sūtras and generally to supplement them); {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} जुगुप्साविरामप्रमादार्थानामुपसंख्यानं; <ab>cf.</ab> इष्टि. {@--3@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A substitute in form or sense.
